summary: WHEEL LUGS BOLTS:  AT 40720 MILES (4/9/03) CAR WAS IN SUBARU DEALER FOR REAR BRAKES.  TWO LUG BOLTS FROM THE RIGHT REAR WHEEL WERE FOUND TO BE SNAPPED AND FELL OFF IN THE MECHANICS HAND.  THAT WAS A WEEK AGO.  TODAY AFTER ABOUT 900 MILES TWO LUG BOLTS ON THE SAME WHEEL HAD SNAPPED OFF.  DEALER TOWED THE CAR IN FOR REPAIRS.      *JB
